title: Poland: "Wakacje w obiektywie" (Holidays on Camera), Citi Handlowy's New Competition
summary: Warsaw - Citi Handlowy's "Wakacje w obiektywie" (Holidays on Camera) competition for Citibank credit cards holders has begun. Customers who regularly use their cards can win Samsung Galaxy S III phones and sets of books by Beata Pawlikowska. In addition, the winners will meet with the famous traveler.
tag-1: Poland: "Wakacje w obiektywie" (Holidays on Camera), Citi Handlowy's New Competition
tag-2: Warsaw – Citi Handlowy's "Wakacje w obiektywie" (Holidays on Camera) competition for Citibank credit cards holders has begun. Customers who regularly use their cards can win Samsung Galaxy S III phones and sets of books by Beata Pawlikowska. In addition, the winners will meet with the famous traveler.
tag-3: "The goal of the competition is to encourage our customers to have fun while using Citibank Credit Cards," says Citi's Magdalena Kwiatkowska. "Each user who enrolls in any of the three stages of the competition and makes payments for at least PLN 300 with a Citibank credit card stands a chance of winning a prize. This is a great opportunity to our customers to show their talents as photographers and discover th advantages of using our credit cards."
tag-4: The Holidays on Camera competition began on July 9. This year, the competition has three stages, each of a different theme. From July 9 to 29, clients are encouraged to send in photos with the theme of "select company;" from July30 to August19, the theme is "holiday trophies" and from August 20 to September 9, the theme will be "around the world." In addition, users can go to the competition website and transform a photo into a holiday postcard that the user can share with friends.
tag-5: The competition is available to Citibank credit card holders who make transactions for the total amount of PLN 300 at any stage of the competition. All the user needs to do is to register at www.konkurs.citirabaty.pl.
tag-6: Credit card holders can also use a discount program, which is one of the biggest programs of this kind in Poland. It is available from over 300 partners (and new partners are still joining the program) and 5,000 outlets across Poland. At www.citirabaty.pl, card holders may use geo-location feature that enables them to find discounts as well as cyclical "SuperOferty" (super offers) and special promotional offers.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-8: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://blog.citigroup.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi
tag-9: Citi Handlowy Citi Handlowy is one of the major financial institutions in Poland and offers, under the Citi Handlowy brand, a broad range of state-of-the-art products in corporate, investment and consumer banking. Through its modern distribution channels and a network of over 138 branches, Bank Handlowy services 20,000 corporate customers and 965,000 individual ones. The Bank's group includes Dom Maklerski Banku Handlowego (brokerage house) and Handlowy Leasing. Being a member of Citi enables the customers of Bank Handlowy access to financial services provided in over 100 countries. Further information is available at www.citihandlowy.pl.
